panels.visual: Final splash panel Party silhouetted against starlit sky Everpeak glowing below **Caption:** "But the five heroes who saved Everpeak knew the truth: They had given the citadel a future. And that was enough." Prismor: "The high elves sacrificed everything for this place." Lunara: "And we honored that sacrifice by letting it grow." Pocky: "Not the same as before..." Malrik: "Better." Val: "Different. And worth protecting."  Warm coppers/golds for Val Cool blues/crystals for Prismor Deep blues/silvers for Pocky Greens/browns for Lunara Purple/grays for Malrik Multi-colored essence effects throughout Golden light for Sorrel Ancient elven architecture mixed with lived-in spaces Magical energy as visible colored light Winter/snow contrasted with magical warmth Each essence has distinct color coding Character growth shown through body language and expression changes Magical effects: flowing, ethereal lettering Combat: bold, sharp lettering Essence manifestations: color-coded to match essence type

characters.Val: Height: Just under 7 feet tall Build: Lean and athletic, with the wiry strength of a monk Scales: Warm brass/copper-bronze color with a subtle metallic sheen that catches light Simple monastery robes in earth tones (browns, tans) Robes have subtle wear marks and chalk dust from courier work
characters.Lunara: Height: 5'8" Build: Graceful and lithe, natural athleticism Hair: Long, flowing chestnut brown with flowers woven in Practical druid robes in earthy greens and browns Living vines and small flowers woven into clothing
characters.Malrik: Height: 5'6" Build: Slim, agile, acrobat's build Skin: Dark gray-blue drow complexion Dark leather armor, well-maintained but not flashy Street performer's clothing underneath - colorful vest
characters.Prismor: Height: 7 feet tall, imposing presence Build: Muscular and powerful, warrior's physique Scales: Crystalline blue with hints of green, almost gem-like quality Plate armor with crystalline accents that match his scales Oath of the Ancients symbols etched into armor (leaves, vines, natural motifs)
characters.Apocalypse Winter: Human wizard, young man in early 20s. 5'10" tall, strong but scholarly build. Dark hair, somewhat unkempt from library hours. Keen blue eyes, intelligent and curious. Pale skin from indoor studying. Determined jawline, slight worry lines from concentration. Practical wizard robes in deep blue with silver trim. Leather satchel stuffed with scrolls and books. Component pouch at belt. Ink-stained fingers. Reading glasses. Carries himself with quiet determination despite youth.

panels.prompt:
Professional comic book panel illustration.

Location: Everpeak Citadel - massive mountain fortress carved from white stone with multiple crystalline towers reaching skyward. Built atop converging ley lines (faint glowing lines visible in mountain). Snow-capped peaks surrounding. Ancient high elven architecture mixed with newer additions. Magical lights and lanterns visible. Grand courtyards, terrace gardens on impossible ledges, winding paths and staircases carved into mountain. Festival decorations - ribbons, lanterns, banners. Smoke from chimneys and forges. Winter setting with snow.


Characters:
- Val: Height: Just under 7 feet tall Build: Lean and athletic, with the wiry strength of a monk Scales: Warm brass/copper-bronze color with a subtle metallic sheen that catches light Simple monastery robes in earth tones (browns, tans) Robes have subtle wear marks and chalk dust from courier work
- Lunara: Height: 5'8" Build: Graceful and lithe, natural athleticism Hair: Long, flowing chestnut brown with flowers woven in Practical druid robes in earthy greens and browns Living vines and small flowers woven into clothing
- Malrik: Height: 5'6" Build: Slim, agile, acrobat's build Skin: Dark gray-blue drow complexion Dark leather armor, well-maintained but not flashy Street performer's clothing underneath - colorful vest
- Sorrel: 
- Prismor: Height: 7 feet tall, imposing presence Build: Muscular and powerful, warrior's physique Scales: Crystalline blue with hints of green, almost gem-like quality Plate armor with crystalline accents that match his scales Oath of the Ancients symbols etched into armor (leaves, vines, natural motifs)
- Apocalypse Winter: Human wizard, young man in early 20s. 5'10" tall, strong but scholarly build. Dark hair, somewhat unkempt from library hours. Keen blue eyes, intelligent and curious. Pale skin from indoor studying. Determined jawline, slight worry lines from concentration. Practical wizard robes in deep blue with silver trim. Leather satchel stuffed with scrolls and books. Component pouch at belt. Ink-stained fingers. Reading glasses. Carries himself with quiet determination despite youth.

And that was enough." Prismor: "The high elves sacrificed everything for this place." Lunara: "And we honored that sacrifice by letting it grow." Pocky: "Not the same as before..." Malrik: "Better." Val: "Different. And worth protecting."
